title: Brandon bantams sweep
text:

Ty Thorpe capped the Brandon Wheat Kings’ three-game sweep to open the Winnipeg AAA Bantam Hockey League Division 1 season with three goals of his own on Sunday afternoon in Carman. 
Tristan Robins added a goal and two helpers for Brandon (3-0-0), while Colin Cook supplied the other marker in a 5-3 win over the host Pembina Valley Hawks (0-1-1). Please subscribe to view full article. 
Already subscribed? Login to view full article.

Ty Thorpe capped the Brandon Wheat Kings’ three-game sweep to open the Winnipeg AAA Bantam Hockey League Division 1 season with three goals of his own on Sunday afternoon in Carman. 
Tristan Robins added a goal and two helpers for Brandon (3-0-0), while Colin Cook supplied the other marker in a 5-3 win over the host Pembina Valley Hawks (0-1-1). Subscription required to view full article.
